meanings.sent1: Not wearing a seatbelt imperils your safety in a car.
meanings.sent2: Leaving a candle burning imperils the house.
meanings.sent3: Eating spicy food before a run imperils your speed.
meanings.sent4: Ignoring warning signs imperils your well-being.
meanings.sent5: Playing with fire imperils your fingers.

meanings.sent1: Swimming in rough waters imperils inexperienced swimmers.
meanings.sent2: Walking alone in a dark alley imperils your security.
meanings.sent3: Forgetting your umbrella imperils your dryness.
meanings.sent4: Ignoring safety instructions imperils your life.
meanings.sent5: Driving recklessly imperils other drivers on the road.

meanings.sent1: A storm cloud imperils the picnic plans.
meanings.sent2: A leaky roof imperils the electronics in the house.
meanings.sent3: A barking dog imperils the quiet of the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: A broken lock imperils the security of the house.
meanings.sent5: A missed deadline imperils the project's success.
